name: Give It Up! Plus
description: Give It Up! Plus is an impossible music game that will challenge your skills and reflexes. If you enjoy sweating during the game, this is for you. Just don't blame the game if you start breaking things.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 SP1 (64 bit) Processor: 2Ghz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 10 (64 bit) Processor: 2Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
